item.description:
Let us meet for an Indian Buffett at Namaskar in Somerville. After food we will go to nearby bowling alley to play pool and bowling.

I have made a reservation under my name at namaskar for 1pm. When you get there ask for reservation under my name or look for a large group of desis.. The lunch buffet is $11.99

The bowling & pool location is at:

Sacco's Bowl Haven
45 Day St
Somerville, MA 02145
617-776-0552

Pool is $7.50 per table per hour

Candle Pin Bowling is $3.00 per person up to 5 people for an hour. Shoe Rental is $1.50. I think this is as cheap as it gets.
item.how_to_find_us: My cell is 5083147742. Let me know if you are running late or need directions.
item.name: Lunch Buffett at Namaskar & Pool in Somerville
